TypeSignature.Value: public interface IType : Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IType implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type IType = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: Type is the common superinterface for all types in the Java programming language.

remarks.para: Type is the common superinterface for all types in the Java programming language. These include raw types, parameterized types, array types, type variables and primitive types.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
